verses.verse: A Psalm of David.<WH1732> Fret not thyself<WH408> <WH2734> because of evildoers,<WH7489> neither<WH408> be thou envious<WH7065> against the workers<WH6213> of iniquity.<WH5766>
For <WH3588> they shall soon<WH4120> be cut down<WH5243> like the grass,<WH2682> and wither<WH5034> as the green<WH3418> herb.<WH1877>
Trust <WH982> in the LORD,<WH3068> and do<WH6213> good;<WH2896> so shalt thou dwell<WH7931> in the land,<WH776> and verily<WH530> thou shalt be fed.<WH7462>
Delight thyself<WH6026> also in<WH5921> the LORD;<WH3068> and he shall give<WH5414> thee the desires<WH4862> of thine heart.<WH3820>
Commit <WH1556> thy way<WH1870> unto<WH5921> the LORD;<WH3068> trust<WH982> also in<WH5921> him; and he<WH1931> shall bring it to pass.<WH6213>
And he shall bring forth<WH3318> thy righteousness<WH6664> as the light,<WH216> and thy judgment<WH4941> as the noonday.<WH6672>

Rest <WH1826> in the LORD,<WH3068> and wait patiently<WH2342> for him: fret not thyself<WH408> <WH2734> because of him who prospereth<WH6743> in his way,<WH1870> because of the man<WH376> who bringeth wicked devices to pass.<WH6213> <WH4209>
Cease <WH7503> from anger,<WH4480> <WH639> and forsake<WH5800> wrath:<WH2534> fret not thyself<WH408> <WH2734> in any wise<WH389> to do evil.<WH7489>
For <WH3588> evildoers<WH7489> shall be cut off:<WH3772> but those that wait upon<WH6960> the LORD,<WH3068> they<WH1992> shall inherit<WH3423> the earth.<WH776>
For yet<WH5750> a little<WH4592> while, and the wicked<WH7563> shall not<WH369> be: yea, thou shalt diligently consider<WH995> <WH5921> his place,<WH4725> and it shall not<WH369> be.
But the meek<WH6035> shall inherit<WH3423> the earth;<WH776> and shall delight themselves<WH6026> in<WH5921> the abundance<WH7230> of peace.<WH7965>
The wicked<WH7563> plotteth<WH2161> against the just,<WH6662> and gnasheth<WH2786> upon<WH5921> him with his teeth.<WH8127>
The Lord<WH136> shall laugh<WH7832> at him: for<WH3588> he seeth<WH7200> that<WH3588> his day<WH3117> is coming.<WH935>

The wicked<WH7563> have drawn out<WH6605> the sword,<WH2719> and have bent<WH1869> their bow,<WH7198> to cast down<WH5307> the poor<WH6041> and needy,<WH34> and to slay<WH2873> such as be of upright<WH3477> conversation.<WH1870>
Their sword<WH2719> shall enter<WH935> into their own heart,<WH3820> and their bows<WH7198> shall be broken.<WH7665>
A little<WH4592> that a righteous<WH6662> man hath is better<WH2896> than the riches<WH4480> <WH1995> of many<WH7227> wicked.<WH7563>
For <WH3588> the arms<WH2220> of the wicked<WH7563> shall be broken:<WH7665> but the LORD<WH3068> upholdeth<WH5564> the righteous.<WH6662>
The LORD<WH3068> knoweth<WH3045> the days<WH3117> of the upright:<WH8549> and their inheritance<WH5159> shall be<WH1961> forever.<WH5769>
They shall not<WH3808> be ashamed<WH954> in the evil<WH7451> time:<WH6256> and in the days<WH3117> of famine<WH7459> they shall be satisfied.<WH7646>

But <WH3588> the wicked<WH7563> shall perish,<WH6> and the enemies<WH341> of the LORD<WH3068> shall be as the fat<WH3368> of lambs:<WH3733> they shall consume;<WH3615> into smoke<WH6227> shall they consume away.<WH3615>
The wicked<WH7563> borroweth,<WH3867> and payeth<WH7999> not<WH3808> again: but the righteous<WH6662> showeth mercy,<WH2603> and giveth.<WH5414>
For <WH3588> such as be blessed<WH1288> of him shall inherit<WH3423> the earth;<WH776> and they that be cursed<WH7043> of him shall be cut off.<WH3772>
The steps<WH4703> of a good man<WH1397> are ordered<WH3559> by the LORD:<WH4480> <WH3068> and he delighteth<WH2654> in his way.<WH1870>
Though <WH3588> he fall,<WH5307> he shall not<WH3808> be utterly cast down:<WH2904> for<WH3588> the LORD<WH3068> upholdeth<WH5564> him with his hand.<WH3027>
I have been<WH1961> young,<WH5288> and<WH1571> now am old;<WH2204> yet have I not<WH3808> seen<WH7200> the righteous<WH6662> forsaken,<WH5800> nor his seed<WH2233> begging<WH1245> bread.<WH3899>
He is ever<WH3605> <WH3117> merciful,<WH2603> and lendeth;<WH3867> and his seed<WH2233> is blessed.<WH1293>
Depart <WH5493> from<WH4480> evil,<WH7451> and do<WH6213> good;<WH2896> and dwell<WH7931> forevermore.<WH5769>

For <WH3588> the LORD<WH3068> loveth<WH157> judgment,<WH4941> and forsaketh<WH5800> not<WH3808> <WH853> his saints;<WH2623> they are preserved<WH8104> forever:<WH5769> but the seed<WH2233> of the wicked<WH7563> shall be cut off.<WH3772>
The righteous<WH6662> shall inherit<WH3423> the land,<WH776> and dwell<WH7931> therein<WH5921> forever.<WH5703>
The mouth<WH6310> of the righteous<WH6662> speaketh<WH1897> wisdom,<WH2451> and his tongue<WH3956> talketh<WH1696> of judgment.<WH4941>
The law<WH8451> of his God<WH430> is in his heart;<WH3820> none<WH3808> of his steps<WH838> shall slide.<WH4571>
The wicked<WH7563> watcheth<WH6822> the righteous,<WH6662> and seeketh<WH1245> to slay<WH4191> him.
The LORD<WH3068> will not<WH3808> leave<WH5800> him in his hand,<WH3027> nor<WH3808> condemn<WH7561> him when he is judged.<WH8199>

Wait <WH6960> on<WH413> the LORD,<WH3068> and keep<WH8104> his way,<WH1870> and he shall exalt<WH7311> thee to inherit<WH3423> the land:<WH776> when the wicked<WH7563> are cut off,<WH3772> thou shalt see<WH7200> it.
I have seen<WH7200> the wicked<WH7563> in great power,<WH6184> and spreading himself<WH6168> like a green<WH7488> bay tree.<WH249>
Yet he passed away,<WH5674> and, lo,<WH2009> he was not:<WH369> yea, I sought<WH1245> him, but he could not<WH3808> be found.<WH4672>
Mark <WH8104> the perfect<WH8535> man, and behold<WH7200> the upright:<WH3477> for<WH3588> the end<WH319> of that man<WH376> is peace.<WH7965>
But the transgressors<WH6586> shall be destroyed<WH8045> together:<WH3162> the end<WH319> of the wicked<WH7563> shall be cut off.<WH3772>
But the salvation<WH8668> of the righteous<WH6662> is of the LORD:<WH4480> <WH3068> he is their strength<WH4581> in the time<WH6256> of trouble.<WH6869>

And the LORD<WH3068> shall help<WH5826> them, and deliver<WH6403> them: he shall deliver<WH6403> them from the wicked,<WH4480> <WH7563> and save<WH3467> them, because<WH3588> they trust<WH2620> in him.
